content.rendered:
This service involves creating and/or optimizing the Google Local listing of your business for accuracy, rankings and
Google My Business Local Optimization – Starter package
  1. Verify and Optimize your Google My Business listing
  2. Add instructions to your website for users to submit reviews right to your GMB listing (or 1 hour of alternate website work)
  3. Optimize your homepage for your local keywords and target regions
  4. Create 10 local citations
